# `setHeader()`

Attach a header to the client. All subsequent requests will have this header.

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">key</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> <code>string</code>

---

**<span className="parameter-name">value</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> <code>string</code>
